pe6:16.2: acchadanaṁ → avacchanaṁ (bj); avacchadanaṁ (pts-vp-pli1); avecchadanaṁ (mr) | apasacchāgamanaṁ → apasaṭṭhāgamanaṁ (bj)
pe6:51.5: āsappanā → appanā (pts-vp-pli1, mr) | adhiṭṭhāgamanaṁ → anadiṭṭhānaṁ (bj); aniṭṭhāgamanaṁ (mr)
pe6:58.2: sammadaññāvimutto → katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho (si), sampajañño vimutto (pts1ed, mr)
pe6:72.2: gatapaṭṭho → vigataṭṭho (bj); appaṭṭho (pts-vp-pli1) | vivaṭṭaṭṭho → vivattaṭṭho suññaṭṭho (bj)
